From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin decorāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [də.kuˈɾa]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [də.koˈɾa]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [de.koˈɾaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)
  • Hyphenation: de‧co‧rar
  • Homophone: decorà (except Valencian)

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decorí, past participle decorat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /o/

  1. (transitive) to decorate
    Synonym: adornar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of decorar (first conjugation)
infinitive decorar
gerund decorant
past participle masculine feminine
singular decorat decorada
plural decorats decorades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present decoro decores decora decorem decoreu decoren
imperfect decorava decoraves decorava decoràvem decoràveu decoraven
future decoraré decoraràs decorarà decorarem decorareu decoraran
preterite decorí decorares decorà decoràrem decoràreu decoraren
conditional decoraria decoraries decoraria decoraríem decoraríeu decorarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present decori decoris decori decorem decoreu decorin
imperfect decorés decoressis decorés decoréssim decoréssiu decoressin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — decora decori decorem decoreu decorin
negative (no) — no decoris no decori no decorem no decoreu no decorin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • decorat

Related terms

[edit]
  • decor
  • decoració
  • decorador
  • decoratiu

Further reading

[edit]
  • “decorar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “decorar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “decorar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “decorar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /dekoˈɾaɾ/ [d̪e.koˈɾaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Hyphenation: de‧co‧rar

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decorei, past participle decorado)

  1. to decorate

decorar

  1. to decorate

Portuguese

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /de.koˈɾa(ʁ)/ [de.koˈɾa(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /de.koˈɾa(ʁ)/ [de.koˈɾa(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /de.koˈɾa(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /de.koˈɾa(ʁ)/ [de.koˈɾa(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /de.koˈɾa(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.kuˈɾaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.kuˈɾaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.kuˈɾa.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: de‧co‧rar

Etymology 1

[edit]

From de cor (“by heart”) +‎ -ar.

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decorei, past participle decorado)

  1. to learn by heart, to memorize
    Estou decorando um texto. ― I am memorizing a text.
Conjugation
[edit]
    Conjugation of decorar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal decorar
Personal decorar decorares decorar decorarmos decorardes decorarem
Gerund
decorando
Past participle
Masculine decorado decorados
Feminine decorada decoradas
Indicative
Present decoro decoras decora decoramos decorais decoram
Imperfect decorava decoravas decorava decorávamos decoráveis decoravam
Preterite decorei decoraste decorou decoramos1, decorámos2 decorastes decoraram
Pluperfect decorara decoraras decorara decoráramos decoráreis decoraram
Future decorarei decorarás decorará decoraremos decorareis decorarão
Conditional decoraria decorarias decoraria decoraríamos decoraríeis decorariam
Subjunctive
Present decore decores decore decoremos decoreis decorem
Imperfect decorasse decorasses decorasse decorássemos decorásseis decorassem
Future decorar decorares decorar decorarmos decorardes decorarem
Imperative
Affirmative decora decore decoremos decorai decorem
Negative (não) não decores não decore não decoremos não decoreis não decorem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Etymology 2

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin decorāre.

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decorei, past participle decorado)

  1. to decorate, adorn, ornament
    Eles decoraram a sala. ― They decorated the room.
Conjugation
[edit]
    Conjugation of decorar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

Further reading

[edit]
  • “decorar” in Dicionário Aberto based on Novo Diccionário da Língua Portuguesa de Cândido de Figueiredo, 1913
  • “decorar”, in Dicionário infopédia da Lingua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Porto: Porto Editora, 2003–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /dekoˈɾaɾ/ [d̪e.koˈɾaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: de‧co‧rar

Etymology 1

[edit]

From Latin decorare (“to adorn, distinguish, honor”).

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decoré, past participle decorado)

  1. (transitive, intransitive) to decorate
    Synonym: adornar
  2. (transitive) to garnish
Conjugation
[edit]

Related terms
[edit]
  • decoración
  • decorado
  • decorador
  • decorativo

Etymology 2

[edit]

From de coro (“by heart”) +‎ -ar.

Verb

[edit]

decorar (first-person singular present decoro, first-person singular preterite decoré, past participle decorado)

  1. (transitive) to learn by heart
    Synonym: memorizar
  2. (transitive) to recite
    Synonym: recitar
  3. (transitive) to syllabify
Conjugation
[edit]
    Conjugation of decorar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive decorar
gerund decorando
past participle masculine feminine
singular decorado decorada
plural decorados decoradas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros

decorásvos 		decora decoramos decoráis decoran

subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present decore decorestú
decorésvos2 		decore decoremos decoréis decoren
imperfect
(ra) 		decorara decoraras decorara decoráramos decorarais decoraran
imperfect
(se) 		decorase decorases decorase decorásemos decoraseis decorasen
future1 decorare decorares decorare decoráremos decorareis decoraren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative decoratú
decorávos 		decore decoremos decorad decoren
negative no decores no decore no decoremos no decoréis no decoren

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of decorar

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.
